question:
[Fay] and her aunt, [Ethel], went to the deli. They got a half a pound of corned beef, and two pounds of salami. [Fay] went shoe shopping with her sister [Dannielle]. [Timothy] bought a new dress for his daughter [Judy]. [Janice] went to the mall, because she wanted to look for a present for her daughter, [Dannielle]. [Freddie] wanted to go to his grandfather [Timothy] 'house because he always has a good time when he is there. [Judy] enjoyed a homemade dinner with her son [Gerald] [Lawrence] invited his father [Joseph] and his brother [Freddie] to go on a weekend fishing trip. [Gerald]'s aunt, [Janice], took him fishing
Question: How is [Ethel] related to [Joseph]?

Step 2: Identify the relationships that are explicitly mentioned in the story:

Step 3: Identify any indirect relationships that can help us determine the relationship between [Ethel] and [Joseph]:

Based on the information provided, we can infer that [Ethel] is likely [Joseph]'s wife and [Freddie]'s mother.
